QueryResult.text: SELECT r.id resource_id, c.start_date month_start_date, CASE WHEN NVL(r.date_of_hire,TO_DATE('01/01/1900','MM/DD/YYYY')) < c.end_date AND NVL(r.date_of_termination,TO_DATE('01/01/2100','MM/DD/YYYY')) > c.start_date AND r.is_active = 1 THEN 100 ELSE 0 END avail_percent, CASE WHEN NVL(r.date_of_hire,TO_DATE('01/01/1900','MM/DD/YYYY')) < c.end_date AND NVL(r.date_of_termination,TO_DATE('01/01/2100','MM/DD/YYYY')) > c.start_date AND r.is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END avail_fte FROM srm_resources r, rpt_calendar c WHERE c.period_type = 'MONTHLY' AND r.resource_type <= 1
